name: Cosmic Icarus Passive T3
owner: Icarus, Daedalus, Icarus Eddie, or Fallen Icarus Eddie character.
passiveSkills: Grants +50% increase to all stats in battle
Disable the passives of up to 3 enemies at the start of battle for 1 turn
Increase damage dealt to all enemies by +15%
Avoid taking damage for 1 turn and revive a random ally every time you take damage when you reach 1 HP the first time in battle
This Talisman's effects only activates when equipped to Icarus, Daedalus, Icarus Eddie, or Fallen Icarus Eddie character.
